title: Prologue to the Beginning and End
episode_desc: A scientist can't recall events that others claim he experienced.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Time Travel Paranoia
episode_desc: Okabe is surprised to see Makise up and about after she was killed.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Parallel Process Paranoia
episode_desc: Okabe suspects his microwave oven is behind the recent unusual events.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Interpreter Rendezvous...
episode_desc: Okabe needs to find a very old computer to hack a very new tech.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Starmine Rendezvous
episode_desc: A successful hack reveals SERN's big secret.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Butterfly Effect's Divergence
episode_desc: Okabe's small scale experiment is partially successful.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Divergence Singularity
episode_desc: Okabe takes his experimentation to the next level by texting the winning lotto numbers back in time, but he fails to consider how his actions might alter the present - or the future.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Chaos Theory Homeostasis I
episode_desc: The latest experiment for Okabe and his lab mates leads to the disappearance of one of their own. Next, they'll attempt to use their time travel technology to make a young boy's dream a reality.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Chaos Theory Homeostasis II
episode_desc: Okabe grows concerned over the drastic changes his experimentation is causing, and the IBN-5100 disappears from the lab. The only hope for finding a replacement rests upon the delicate shoulders of Feyris the cat girl.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Chaos Theory Homeostasis III
episode_desc: The part-time warrior from downstairs tells Okabe about the search for her missing father. Meanwhile, the aspiring mad scientist is troubled by a mysterious text message.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Dogma in Event Horizon
episode_desc: As the lab members prepare to transport human memories by way of a Time Leap, Okabe receives some highly disturbing news: Makise may be a SERN spy!
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Dogma in Ergosphere
episode_desc: Tension builds at the Lab when Makise and Suzuha both show up for the party, but that's just the beginning. As the night draws to a close, armed thugs - led by a familiar face - come looking for the time machine.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Metaphysics Necrosis
episode_desc: Okabe, desperate to prevent the tragedy he's already seen happen, summons the courage for a daring Time Leap. Can he save the life of his oldest and dearest companion?
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Physically Necrosis
episode_desc: Despite his many attempts, Okabe is unable to prevent the death of Mayuri, so he turns to Makise for help solving the riddle of time travel. Later, Suzuha's true identity is revealed
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Missing Link Necrosis
episode_desc: Suzuha reveals the orgins of SERN's future totalitarianism. While she continues her work to destroy the organization, Okabe and Mayuri continue the search for Suzuha's father.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Sacrificial Necrosis
episode_desc: The truth about Suzuha's father is finally revealed. Okabe realizes the devastating consequences of stopping her from leaving the night of the party.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Made in Complex
episode_desc: After the change in divergence fails to have a lasting effect, Okabe and Kurisu set out to further manipulate time in the hopes of gaining an IBN 5100.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Fractal Androgynous
episode_desc: In a further attempt to rescue Mayuri from her fate, Okabe reveals Ruka's past to her. Ruka must make a difficult decision that might change her entire life.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Endless Apoptosis
episode_desc: Okabe must make a time leap in order to save Moeka from herself. He realizes that all is not what it seems as Moeka's shady behavior leads him closer to the IBN 5100.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Finalize Apoptosis
episode_desc: With the help of Kurisu and Moeka, Okabe attempts to get closer to the IBN 5100 and the mysterious FB. As he closes in on SERN's network, he realizes that the path to victory will not be without additional sacrifice.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Paradox Meltdown
episode_desc: With his new discovery in mind, Okabe continues his attempts to protect Mayuri while also trying to avoid Kurisu's potential impending fate.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Being Meltdown
episode_desc: In order to continue his work against SERN, Okabe must finally choose between saving Kurisu or Mayuri.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Open the Steins Gate
episode_desc: Tasked with preventing an impending World War III by an alternate Suzuha, Okabe finds himself playing an active part in Kurisu's death.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Achievement Point
episode_desc: Okabe has one final chance to travel back in time, set everything right, and save the girl he never even got to love. His mission is vital, but it may mean the end for the mad scientist.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Egoistic Poriomania
episode_desc: After being invited to Los Angeles by Faris, Okabe finds himself chasing after someone who looks strikingly like Suzuha. Later, Okabe and Kurisu discuss their potential love for each other.
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Kyoukaimenjou No Missing Link - Divide by Zero
episode_desc: Alternate 23rd episode of Steins;Gate, which leads into the story of "Steins;Gate 0".
show_desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.
